code: var CryptoJS=require("crypto-js");export var encryptData=function encryptData(data){return CryptoJS.AES.encrypt(JSON.stringify(data),process.env.REACT_APP_ENCRYPTION_KEY).toString();};export var decryptData=function decryptData(data){if(data){var bytes=CryptoJS.AES.decrypt(data,process.env.REACT_APP_ENCRYPTION_KEY);return JSON.parse(bytes.toString(CryptoJS.enc.Utf8));}};export var getAccessToken=function getAccessToken(){return decryptData(localStorage.getItem("access_token"));};
